description:
you make your way up, slowly, carefully.

a cry from behind you. you turn. instinctively you clutch the orb.

time slows down. Ohm is slipping, grasping for help.
investigationDescription: Ohm is slipping. they reach for you.

exits.description: Ohm lies still on the rocks behind you. rain runs over their staring eyes. <color=purple>they will be fine. leave them for now.</color>

investigationDescription: Ohm lies still on the rocks. their eyes do not see you. <color=purple>they will be fine. leave them for now.</color>

exits.description: Ohm moves forward with a speed you cannot match. you see them dart into a cave up ahead.

investigationDescription: you notice bloody footprints on the stone, washing away in the rain.
